import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import { FaUsers, FaStore, FaStar, FaUserShield, FaUserTag, FaChartLine } from 'react-icons/fa'; const AdminDashboard = () => { const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalUsers: 0, totalStores: 0, totalRatings: 0, usersByRole: { admin: 0, store_owner: 0, user: 0 }, recentUsers: [], recentStores: [], topRatedStores: [] }); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(null); const [filters, setFilters] = useState({ name: '', email: '', address: '', role: '' }); const [storeSearch, setStoreSearch] = useState({ name: '', address: '' }); const [filteredStores, setFilteredStores] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchStats = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get('/api/admin/dashboard'); setStats(response.data); } catch (err) { console.error('Error fetching dashboard stats:', err); setError('Failed to load dashboard statistics'); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; fetchStats(); }, []); const handleStoreSearch = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setStoreSearch(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); // Filter stores based on search criteria const filtered = stats.topRatedStores.filter(store => store.name.toLowerCase().includes(value.toLowerCase()) || store.address.toLowerCase().includes(value.toLowerCase()) ); setFilteredStores(filtered); }; if (loading) return
Loading dashboard data...
; if (error) { return (

); } return (

{user.username}
{user.email}

)) ) : (

{(filteredStores.length > 0 ? filteredStores : stats.topRatedStores).map(store => (
{store.name}
{store.address}
{store.averageRating?.toFixed(1) || 'N/A'}
))}
{/* Quick Links */}

); }; export default AdminDashboard;
